alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Huron; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 5:12PM EDT until August 20 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Richland County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Huron County in north central Ohio... Northern Ashland County in north central Ohio... East central Crawford County in north central Ohio... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 512 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shelby to 8 miles north of Ontario to near Mansfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Shelby, New London, Plymouth, Savannah, Polk, Sullivan, Greenwich, North Fairfield, Bailey Lakes, Tiro, Nova, Nankin, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
